changeSet.comment: the details table of 'Terra DataRepo' source
changeSet.sql: CREATE TYPE TerraDataRepoSourceDetails AS ( id BIGINT, -- unique to this table start_time TIMESTAMPTZ, -- start timestamp of the TDR data query interval end_time TIMESTAMPTZ, -- end timestamp of the TDR data query interval datarepo_row_ids TEXT[], -- array of datarepo row ids for snapshot creation snapshot_creation_job_id TEXT, -- id of the TDR snapshot creation job updated TIMESTAMPTZ, -- status update time consumed TIMESTAMPTZ -- time when consumed, null otherwise )
